Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Whether a given team is assigned to a project

Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Whether a user story is scheduled in a sprint

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Whether a task is assigned to a specific worker

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Whether a feature is included in a release plan

Name: select_epic_for_backlog
Description: Whether an epic is included in the product backlog

Name: activate_sprint
Description: Whether a sprint is active in the plan

Name: prioritize_user_story_rank
Description: Priority rank assigned to a user story

Name: allocate_budget_to_project
Description: Allocated budget amount to a project

Name: set_sprint_capacity_points
Description: Capacity (story points) planned for a sprint

Name: set_task_effort_refinement
Description: Refined effort estimate for a task

Name: choose_scrum_master_for_team
Description: Whether a Scrum Master is linked to a team

Name: invite_stakeholder_to_review
Description: Whether a stakeholder is invited to a Sprint Review
